```{r}

```

# Explore Data and Clean
```{r}
house[1:20,] %>% 
  View()

skim(house)

house <- 
  house %>% rename_with(tolower) %>% 
  rename_with( ~ gsub(" information", "", .x)) %>% 
  rename_with( ~ gsub(" ", "_", .x))
```


```{r}
house <- house %>% 
  mutate(across(c(bath:sqft, tax:total_cost), ~ parse_number(.x)))

house <- house %>% 
  rename(by_car = commute) %>% 
  mutate(by_car = parse_number(by_car))


house <- house %>% 
  mutate(type = sub(",.*","", home_details))
```


```{r}
house %>% 
  keep(is.numeric) %>% 
  select(-lon, -lat) %>% 
  gather() %>% 
  ggplot(aes(value)) + geom_histogram() + facet_wrap(~key, scales = "free")

house %>% 
  keep(is.numeric) %>% 
  select(-lon, -lat) %>% 
  pivot_longer(-price) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(value, price)) + geom_point() +
  scale_y_log10() + scale_x_log10() +
  facet_wrap(~name)
```


```{r}
house %>% 
  select_if(is.numeric) %>% 
  drop_na() %>% 
  pivot_longer(-price) %>% 
  group_by(name) %>% 
  summarize(corr = cor(price, value)) %>% 
  arrange(-abs(corr))


tidy_model <- house %>% 
  select_if(is.numeric) %>% 
  drop_na() %>% 
  pivot_longer(-price) %>% 
  nest(-name) %>% 
  mutate(mod = map(data, ~ lm(log(price) ~ value, .x)),
         tidy = map(mod, broom::tidy)) %>% 
  unnest(tidy)
```


```{r}
tidy_model %>% 
  filter(term == "value") %>% 
  arrange(-abs(estimate))
```
